Package domain

Class Composed

java.lang.Object
domain.Activity
domain.Composed
public class Composed extends Activity
this class represents a composed activity that can be parallel or sequential it is composed of other activities

    • time

      public int time(int dUnknow, int dError, int dEmpty)
      Calculates an estimated time using default values when necessary
      Parameters:
      dUnknow - valor por defecto para actividades desconocidas
      dError - valor por defecto para actividades con error
      dEmpty - valor por defecto para actividades vacias
      Returns:
      el tiempo estimado

    • time

      public int time(char modality) throws ProjectException
      Calculate an estimated time considering the modality, if is possible.
      Parameters:
      modality - ['A'(verage), 'M' (ax)] Use the average or maximum time of known activities to estimate unknown ones or those with error.
      Returns:
      0
      Throws:
      ProjectException - IMPOSSIBLE, if it can't be calculated
